tns:patch.author: Alexandru Artimon
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_donor_date_hierarchy AS SELECT a.amp_activity_id, fd.amp_fund_detail_id, fd.transaction_date AS full_date, date_part('year'::text, fd.transaction_date) AS year, date_part('month'::text, fd.transaction_date) AS month, to_char(fd.transaction_date, 'TMMonth'::text) AS month_name, date_part('quarter'::text, fd.transaction_date) AS quarter, ('Q'::text || date_part('quarter'::text, fd.transaction_date)) AS quarter_name FROM amp_activity a, amp_funding f, amp_funding_detail fd WHERE ((a.amp_activity_id = f.amp_activity_id) AND (f.amp_funding_id = fd.amp_funding_id));;;
